metadata.title: CVE-2016-9772 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: OpenAFS 1.6.19 and earlier allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive directory information via vectors involving the (1) client cache partition, (2) fileserver vice partition, or (3) certain RPC responses.

criterions.comment: openafs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.20-1').
